targetAudience: B2B decision makers, IT directors, SaaS buyers 28-50

mediaPlan.tactic: Programmatic Display — B2B Awareness & Lead Gen

brief.executiveSummary: Nimbus Labs is launching Nimbus Cloud Suite — an all-in-one business management platform for SMBs — at SaaStr Annual 2026. This campaign drives awareness and free trial signups through targeted B2B channels including LinkedIn, display, video, and intent-based retargeting.
brief.whyNow: SaaStr Annual is the premier SaaS conference, creating maximum visibility among target buyers. Post-pandemic SMBs are still consolidating their tech stack, creating opportunity for an integrated solution.
brief.primaryOutcome: 2,500 free trial signups within 90 days of campaign launch
messagePillars: One platform, everything connected — CRM, project management, accounting, team chat
Built for growing businesses — scales from 10 to 500 employees seamlessly
99.9% uptime guarantee — enterprise reliability at SMB pricing
Setup in 24 hours — no consultants, no complexity, just results
brief.valueProposition: The only business platform that grows with you — from startup chaos to enterprise scale, everything connected in one place.
brief.reasonToBelieve: 5-star G2 reviews, 99.9% uptime SLA, used by 10,000+ businesses, integrates with 200+ apps, SOC2 certified security

audience.primary: SMB decision makers 28-50, 10-500 employees, currently using multiple disconnected tools
audience.secondary: IT directors, operations managers, growing startups transitioning from spreadsheets
audience.targeting: Business software users, SaaS trial signups, B2B publication readers, LinkedIn professional targeting
audience.exclusions: Enterprise (500+ employees), existing customers, non-business email addresses

compliance.privacyStance: SOC2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, enterprise-grade security emphasized
compliance.disclosures: "30-day free trial, no credit card required. See nimbuscloud.com/terms for details."
compliance.wordsToAvoid: "Free forever", "replaces all your tools", "enterprise-only features", specific competitor mentions
